footer_navigation.disclaimer_1: The crypto market can be volatile. Be aware of tax obligations, as profits may be subject to capital gains or other taxes depending on your location.
footer_navigation.disclaimer_2: Regulations differ across regions, so it's essential to understand the rules that apply to you. Do thorough research and only invest what you can afford to lose.

staking.title: Welcome to $PEPETO Staking

misc.meta_title: PEPETO Tokenâ€“ The Ultimate Memecoin Revolution | Presale for Multi-Memecoin Exchange
misc.meta_data: Pepeto is back with the true power of technology and optimization, creating a revolutionary exchange that adopts all memecoins. Join the presale to be part of the memecoin evolution Pepe could never achieve!

faq.faq_1: Who is the God of frog?
faq.faq_cont_1:
Pepeto is the God of Frogs, embodying wisdom and power. His value comes from mastering "Technology" and "Optimization," the key components Pepe missed. While Pepe stole four documents, he overlooked these crucial pieces, making him incomplete.

Pepeto's bridge technology connects blockchains, ensuring secure and transparent transfers. He symbolizes innovation, fairness, and the future of decentralized systems, bringing what Pepe couldnâ€™t: the complete solution.
faq.faq_2: When can I claim my Tokens?
faq.faq_cont_2: The claiming process uses secure Web3Toolkit technology, allowing you to claim tokens after the presale ends. Simply reconnect your wallet, such as MetaMask, and click "claim." Additionally, Web3Payments enables staking of your tokens once theyâ€™ve been claimed.
faq.faq_3: What is Pepetoswap? Why is it better?
faq.faq_cont_3: Pepeto Exchange is designed with several standout features that make it superior:
faq.faq_cont_4: Pepeto exchange and ecosystem will be released once the presale has ended! AKA the day of judgment.
faq.faq_cont_3_2: Cross-Chain Bridge: Seamless interoperability between multiple blockchains ensures easy and flexible token transfers.
faq.faq_cont_3_3: Honest and Corruption-Free: As the God of Frogs, Pepeto guarantees a fair and transparent platform. Only deserving tokens are listed, ensuring no favoritism or corruption in the process.
faq.faq_cont_3_5: Supportive Environment: Pepeto offers assistance for new projects, fostering growth and success for all worthy participants.
faq.faq_cont_3_6: This combination of fairness, innovation, and security makes Pepeto Exchange stand out.

about.head: Who is the god of frogs
about.para1: Pepeto returns with true powerâ€”Technology and Optimization. He holds the missing pieces Pepe could never understand. Beyond strength, Pepeto brings wisdom and unity, creating an exchange that adopts all memecoins, giving them real value and a place to thrive. This is the revolution Pepe could never achieve.
about.para2: Read the whitepaper to know the full story

token.title: Value of $PEPETO Token
token.desc: Under the watchful guidance of Pepeto, the god of frogs, the $PEPETO token stands as a symbol of trust and strength. Fully audited, with its smart contract code openly disclosed, it ensures complete transparency and security for all users. Itâ€™s the foundation of Pepetoâ€™s vision of wisdom, safety, and unity for the crypto community.
token.card1_desc: Power drives Pepeto forward through collective participation. As an investor, you're part of a growing force that builds impact together
token.card2_desc: Energy keeps the ecosystem alive and always moving forward. Investors benefit from a dynamic project that's always in action, driving new opportunities
token.card3_desc: Precision means strategic, calculated decisions to optimize benefits and reduce risks. Every step is take to provide value to investors
token.card3_button: All will be shared & discussed through Pepeto's social
token.card4_desc: Efficiency focuses resources to get maximum returns. Investors can trust in a system designed to deliever high-value outcomes at low cost, with a sophisticated model that rewards early investors.
token.card5_desc: Technology is the backbone of $PEPETO, bringing scalability and powerful exchange for investors. Unlike pepe, which lacks real technological strength, Pepeto has built a solid foundation to support long-term value.
token.card6_desc: Optimization ensures peak perfomence, maximizing returns and preventing price dumps. Unlike Pepe, Pepeto, the God of frogs, is designed for stability and sustainable community growth, safeguarding investor confidence.

tokenomics.presale_para: Presale: 30% of the total supply will be allocated to the presale phase, ensuring enough liquidity and participation to jumpstart the project.
tokenomics.staking_para: Staking: 30% of the total supply will be reserved for staking rewards, incentivizing long-term holders and fostering a stable ecosystem.
tokenomics.marketing_para: Marketing: 20% will be dedicated to marketing efforts, including partnerships with influencers, social media promotions, and broader campaigns to drive mass adoption.
tokenomics.proj_para: Project Development: 7.5% will be allocated for ongoing project development, ensuring that Pepeto continues to evolve and improve post-launch.
tokenomics.liq_para: Liquidity: 12.5% will be reserved to maintain healthy liquidity across exchanges, ensuring smooth trading and stability.

roadmap.title: ROADMAP
roadmap.card2_point1: Audit and Public Disclosure of Smart Contract
roadmap.card4_point3: Ongoing Marketing and Mass Adoption Initiatives

bridge.title: PEPETO bridge
bridge.desc: Pepetoâ€™s bridge isnâ€™t just a tool; it embodies his wisdom and unifying power, connecting different blockchain worlds. As part of the Technology he mastered, the bridge allows assets to move seamlessly using a lock and mint mechanismâ€”locking tokens on one chain while minting equivalents on another.
bridge.desc_1: Unlike Pepe, who overlooked this vital aspect, Pepeto ensures interoperability with decentralized security and no central authority, linking fragmented ecosystems in a way Pepe could never achieve.
bridge.title_2: You believed in the God of frogs!
bridge.benefits_4_para: Scam-prone tokens are rejected, ensuring trust.
bridge.desc_2: If your project merits a listing, it will be granted with FULL integrity. Should any support be needed, the God of Frogs will guide you.

howTobuy.title: How to buy $PEPETO
howTobuy.desc_1: If you already have a compatible walletâ€“go to step 2. If not, we suggest Metamask for desktop. On mobile, we recommend Best Wallet: Simply download the app to get started!
howTobuy.desc_2: Paying by card? Go to step 3. If paying by crypto, load your favourite crypto onto your wallet. ETH, USDT, and BNB are accepted.
howTobuy.desc_3: Want more Gains? Connect your wallet to the website. Choose a payment method. Choose the amount of $PEPETO you want to buyâ€“then Buy or Buy and Stake for max gains.

giveaway.info2: 7 lucky winners will share $700,000 worth of $PEPETO tokens â€” this is your chance to become part of the next legendary meme revolution.
